title: 1938 Detroit Lions season
text:
The <a href="1938%20NFL%20season">1938</a> <a href="Detroit%20Lions">Detroit Lions</a> season was their ninth in the <a href="National%20Football%20League">league</a>. The team matched their <a href="1937%20Detroit%20Lions%20season">previous season</a>'s output of 7–4. They failed to qualify for the playoffs for the third consecutive season.
Schedule.
Note: Intra-division opponents are in bold text.
